title: Visual Description Completeness Checklist
description: An interactive checklist for instructional designers to verify that their visual descriptions include all essential components for effective AI-assisted MicroSim generation.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Education
Instructional Design
Visual Description
Quality Assurance
Checklist
learningObjectives: Recall the essential components of a complete visual description
Verify that visual descriptions include all necessary specifications
Understand the importance of detailed specifications for AI code generation
Apply a systematic approach to creating visual specifications
prerequisites: Basic understanding of visual design concepts

controls.description: Click checkboxes to mark items as complete
Click category headers to expand/collapse sections
Hover over items to see example specifications in tooltips
Reset All button clears all checkboxes
Export Text button copies checklist status to clipboard

assumptions: Complete visual descriptions improve AI generation quality
limitations: Checklist covers common elements but may not include domain-specific requirements
Does not validate the quality of specifications, only their presence
Export function requires clipboard API support in browser
